mapper.insert: insert into ge_user (id, enterprise_id, institution_id, number, password, contact, email, head_portrait, phone, remark, id_card, birthday, parse_id, status, type ,role_id ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{institutionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{headPortrait,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{parseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update: update ge_user set enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, institution_id = #{institutionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, head_portrait = #{headPortrait,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id_card = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, parse_id = #{parseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
